name: Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel
description:
At Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel we offer studio or 1 bedroom apartments. Our 1 bedroom apartments are either a loft style with an upstairs mezzanine bedroom or your conventional one bedroom layout with lounge/dining separated from the bedroom. Our studio apartments are spacious and offer our guests all the conveniences needed when staying with us for only a short period of time.

Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel is a strataâ€“titled building so each apartment is furnished either to the individual taste of the apartment owners or with the furniture package that is offered as standard throughout the majority of the hotel. While some differences may be noticed from apartment to apartment our guests can be assured of our commitment to offering the highest standards and quality in each apartment.

Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel is a totally non-smoking building this does included balconies. Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel does have strict no party policy.

A $50 credit card authorisation is to be provided on check in on weekdays, $100 on weekends alongside photo identification and may be used to cover accommodation.

Car parking can be arranged for a cost of $10 per night.

The following credit card fees apply; Amex 3.5%, Visa and Mastercard 1.75%.

Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel is rated as a 3.5 star property. Every attempt is made to accommodate room specific requests (including balcony option) however they cannot be guaranteed.

We look forward to welcoming you to Central Brunswick Hotel.

houseRules.notes:
Check-in time is 2pm. Check-out is 10:00am. Late check outs may incur a fee.

Cancellations are accepted up to 48 hours prior to your day of arrival stay. 

Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel is a totally non-smoking building this does included balconies. Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel does have strict no party policy.

A $50 credit card authorisation is to be provided on check in alongside photo identification and may be used to cover accommodation.

Car parking can be arranged for a cost of $10 per night.
